LanguageData.rjw_vatgrown_sex_slave.label: 人造性奴隷
LanguageData.rjw_vatgrown_sex_slave.description: [PAWN_nameDef]はヒトというよりは肉便器として造られました。ファクトリーで成長している間に、様々な肉欲を満たすためだけに十分な社交術と性技術を[PAWN_pronoun]は躾けられました。
LanguageData.rjw_feisty.label: 怒れるニンフ
LanguageData.rjw_feisty.description:
[PAWN_nameDef] struts around the colony like a conqueror examining a newly annexed territory. You try to focus on your work but [PAWN_pronoun] won't let you.
 "I heard what you said about me!" [PAWN_pronoun] accuses. You didn't say anything about [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] knows that. "Wanna fight?" [PAWN_pronoun] challenges. You already know what [PAWN_pronoun] means: a few minutes of play wrestling and then you take [PAWN_objective], or, if you hesitate, [PAWN_pronoun] takes you.
 Though [PAWN_nameDef] can be hard to get along with you've come to appreciate how [PAWN_pronoun]'s more practical than the others.
 You explain to [PAWN_objective], "See these things here? They need to be over there" and "Those people are trying to kill us, so let's kill them first." [PAWN_pronoun] listens, and does what is necessary.
LanguageData.rjw_curious.label: 好奇心ニンフ
LanguageData.rjw_curious.description:
Hold the covering plate back and place the actuator in slot C. Line the rod up. No, that won't do, it needs to be perfect. Now pop the JC-444 chip in place.
 Solder the orange wire to pin #16 and the striped wire to pin #5.
 Suddenly, there [PAWN_pronoun] is. You aren't surprised to see [PAWN_nameDef], you just didn't hear [PAWN_objective] approach. By now you're used to it.
 You continue your work in silence as [PAWN_pronoun] hovers over you, her large eyes fixated on the rapid, rythmic, deliberate motions of your hands.
LanguageData.rjw_tender.label: 優しいニンフ
LanguageData.rjw_tender.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は魅力的な目と柔らかくて甘い声をしている。以前看護師をしていたおかげか、人当たりが良い。\n [PAWN_pronoun]は部屋の隅にうずくまり、耳をふさぎ涙をこぼした。屠殺される豚の悲鳴に気づいても、あなたはそれを理解できなかった。
LanguageData.rjw_chatty.label: お喋りニンフ
LanguageData.rjw_chatty.description: [PAWN_nameDef]ほど饒舌な者は居ないでしょう。[PAWN_pronoun]はよく舌が回り、抜け目なく、艶やかな唇を持っています。
LanguageData.rjw_broken.label: 壊れたニンフ
LanguageData.rjw_broken.description: Maybe [PAWN_nameDef] suffered some terrible things, [PAWN_pronoun] looks rather emaciated, and no one wants to speak with [PAWN_objective].\n [PAWN_pronoun] only behaves a bit vivaciously while staring at some rod-like stuffs.
